label: AT&T Smart Wi-Fi
description:
Finds and auto-connects to available hotspots to minimize cellular data consumption.
Auto-connects is not a good idea. You are ok if you go on HTTPS websites. Use a VPN if you want to hide the domain names you visit, avoid usage restriction (no P2P, blacklisted websites...) and encrypt HTTP traffic.
